actions.name: create_record
actions.description: Create a new record in a Quickbase table

actions.name: create_update_records_bulk
actions.description: Bulk create or update multiple records based on a merge key

actions.name: delete_record
actions.description: Delete a record from a Quickbase table

actions.name: find_or_create_record
actions.description: Find an existing record or create a new one if not found

actions.name: find_record
actions.description: Search for records in a Quickbase table using filters

actions.name: update_record
actions.description: Update an existing record in a Quickbase table

triggers.name: new_or_updated_record
triggers.description: Triggers when a record is created or updated in a Quickbase table

triggers.name: new_record
triggers.description: Triggers when a new record is created in a Quickbase table
